TextString.Name: TestSkillDescriptiveNameString
TextString.String: Testami

TextString.Name: TestSkillDescriptionString
TextString.String: Oh s√¨! Testami tutta!

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryCarbsName
TextString.String: Carbs

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryCarbsDescription
TextString.String: Pasta and Rice are the foundation of many meals across many different cultures.

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryCarbsAlternateDescription
TextString.String: Pasta and Rice focused Skills - Applied to the entire Restaurant

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryMeatName
TextString.String: Meat

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryMeatDescription
TextString.String: Meat of any kind has been part of the human diet for thousands years.

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryMeatAlternateDescription
TextString.String: Meat focused Skills - Applied to the entire Restaurant

TextString.Name: SkillCategorySeafoodName
TextString.String: Seafood

TextString.Name: SkillCategorySeafoodDescription
TextString.String: While often considered refined, Seafood is also popular in many poor recipes.

TextString.Name: SkillCategorySeafoodAlternateDescription
TextString.String: Seafood focused Skills - Applied to the entire Restaurant

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryVeggiesName
TextString.String: Vegetables And Fruits

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryVeggiesDescription
TextString.String: Nutritious and healhty, both Vegetables and Fruits are the foundation of many different cooking traditions

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryVeggiesAlternateDescription
TextString.String: Vegetables and Fruits focused Skills - Applied to the entire Restaurant

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryDessertsName
TextString.String: Desserts

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryDessertsDescription
TextString.String: Making Desserts is both an art and a science, it must not be underestimated.

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryDessertsAlternateDescription
TextString.String: Dessert focused Skills - Applied to the entire Restaurant

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryChefName
TextString.String: Cooking

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryChefDescription
TextString.String: Chefs need to train their cooking skills to improve both the kitchen efficiency and the quality of what they prepare..

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryChefAlternateDescription
TextString.String: Chef Skills - Applied to this Chef and the Recipes he/she cooks.

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryWaiterName
TextString.String: Hosting

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryWaiterDescription
TextString.String: Waiters need to train their hosting skills to increase the service quality, especially when dealing with demanding customers.

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryWaiterAlternateDescription
TextString.String: Waiter Skills - Applied to this Waiter and the tasks he/she does.

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryActiveName
TextString.String: Executive Chef

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryActiveDescription
TextString.String: A real Executive Chef is a king and his/her kingdom is the restaurant. With proper skills, the kingdom can be brought to eternal glory.

TextString.Name: SkillCategoryActiveAlternateDescription
TextString.String: Active Skills - Once unlocked can be added to the main UI and used in real time.

TextString.Name: AlDenteSkillName
TextString.String: Al Dente Cooking

TextString.Name: AlDenteSkillDescription
TextString.String:
To preserve the texture of Pasta and Rice, they must be cooked Al Dente.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SaucesDosingSkillName
TextString.String: Sauces Micro-dosing

TextString.Name: SaucesDosingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Sauces can be costly, but using them in a perfect amount can cut the expenses.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: TacticalChoiceSkillName
TextString.String: Tactical Choice

TextString.Name: TacticalChoiceSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Not all kinds of Rice are the same, and knowing to pick the right one it's a good way to save some money
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: StrategicalPreparationSkillName
TextString.String: Strategical Preparation

TextString.Name: StrategicalPreparationSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Having all ingredients at disposal can really help when making a sauce.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PerfectDoughSkillName
TextString.String: Perfect Dough

TextString.Name: PerfectDoughSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Making the perfect dough for Fresh Pasta can lead to better results, but also less wasted materials.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: StarchesMasterySkillName
TextString.String: Starches Mastery

TextString.Name: StarchesMasterySkillDescription
TextString.String:
The secret of a creamy sauce reside in pasta's spontaneous release of starch.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: RollingByTheBookSkillName
TextString.String: Rolling by the book

TextString.Name: RollingByTheBookSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Knowing how to roll a dough means to be able to easily use the resulting pasta later.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: ThousandsLayerCreativitySkillName
TextString.String: Thousand Layers Creativity

TextString.Name: ThousandsLayerCreativitySkillDescription
TextString.String:
Assembling some good Lasagna is not only a matter of impiling stuff, all ingredients must be added with a purpose.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: QualitySortingSkillName
TextString.String: Quality Sorting

TextString.Name: QualitySortingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
There are dozens of different rice variants, knowing the best ones for every recipe can dramatically increase the final result.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SelectiveSoakingSkillName
TextString.String: Selective Soaking

TextString.Name: SelectiveSoakingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Soaking the Rice can be fundamental in every Rice preparation, but it must be made differently for each one of them.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SpecialDoughSkillName
TextString.String: Special Dough

TextString.Name: SpecialDoughSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Who likes colored fresh pasta? Anyone does, so you better learn ho to make pasta dough with special ingredients.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: CreamingSkillName
TextString.String: Creaming

TextString.Name: CreamingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Ask any chef and they will all tell you the same: the secret for an awesome risotto is in the process of creaming.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PerfectCrustSkillName
TextString.String: Perfect Crust

TextString.Name: PerfectCrustSkillDescription
TextString.String:
When cooking Rice in a oven there's only one objective: to make a perfect crust while keeping soft the inside.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: FlavorMixtureSkillName
TextString.String: Flavor Mixture

TextString.Name: FlavorMixtureSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Creating a good Paella means to mix several ingredients to get a flavor explosion.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PanOverheatingSkillName
TextString.String: Pan Overheating

TextString.Name: PanOverheatingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Cooking a Paella is hard, there's always the risk of burning it, but the best cooks know how to speed up the process.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PotatoWhisperingSkillName
TextString.String: Potato Whispering

TextString.Name: PotatoWhisperingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Knowing how to perfectly integrate potatoes with flour allows the creation of better Gnocchi.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: ItalianLanguageLessonsSkillName
TextString.String: Italian Language Lessons

TextString.Name: ItalianLanguageLessonsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
You better learn some Italian if you want to browse the web in search of pasta related tips.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: MassiveLasagnaSkillName
TextString.String: Massive Lasagna

TextString.Name: MassiveLasagnaSkillDescription
TextString.String:
When creating some good Lasagne you may desire to fill them with dozens ingredients, then you better start thinking vertically.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AccurateCreamingProtocolSkillName
TextString.String: Rice Temperature Management

TextString.Name: AccurateCreamingProtocolSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Having temperatures under control is the best way to perfectly cook rice.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AncientPastaDoughSkillName
TextString.String: Ancient Pasta Dough

TextString.Name: AncientPastaDoughSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Translating those ancient scrolls may reveal the secrets of a perfect pasta dough.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: StuffingMaximizationSkillName
TextString.String: Stuffing Maximization

TextString.Name: StuffingMaximizationSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Making Stuffed Pasta is not easy at all, but with pratice a Chef can manage to maximize the stuffing contained in each single pasta piece.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PreventiveCookingSkillName
TextString.String: Preventive Cooking

TextString.Name: PreventiveCookingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Partially cooking dried pasta in advance will make its preparation dramatically faster.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GrandmasSecretsSkillName
TextString.String: Grandmas' Secrets

TextString.Name: GrandmasSecretsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Using modern technology to intercept grandmas' phone calls will allow you to learn their secrets.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AncientPastaLoreSkillName
TextString.String: Ancient Pasta Lore

TextString.Name: AncientPastaLoreSkillDescription
TextString.String:
By getting a Master Degree in Ancient Italian Pasta Lore you will learn all pasta-related secrets. They say the degree is 100% legit!
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: RiceFlavorSequentiatingSkillName
TextString.String: Rice Flavor Sequentiating

TextString.Name: RiceFlavorSequentiatingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Rice has a distinct flavor, studying all its variants will allow a chef to unlock limited flavor combinations.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PaddiesExplorationSkillName
TextString.String: Paddies Exploration

TextString.Name: PaddiesExplorationSkillDescription
TextString.String:
To fully understand Rice a Chef must travel to the places where it is made.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: BrowningControlSkillName
TextString.String: Browning Control

TextString.Name: BrowningControlDescription
TextString.String:
No one likes grey-ish meat, a proper cooking is the key to flavor.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: TimingsStudySkillName
TextString.String: Timings Study

TextString.Name: TimingsStudySkillDescription
TextString.String:
With study and focus the cooking time of meat can be reduced without affecting the overall quality.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: ExpertCutSkillName
TextString.String: Expert Cut

TextString.Name: ExpertCutSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Cutting meat is not easy, an expert butcher can rapidly deploy ready-to-cook meat pieces.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: MaillardAdeptSkillName
TextString.String: Maillard Adept

TextString.Name: MaillardAdeptSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Learning about maillard reactions is the key to unlock the full flavor of meat.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: MarinadeSkillName
TextString.String: Marinade

TextString.Name: MarinadeSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Marinading meat with different compounds is a key process to create better recipes.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: TemperatureCheckSkillName
TextString.String: Temperature Check

TextString.Name: TemperatureCheckSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Cooking without knowing the temperature is for cooks, using a thermometer is for Chefs.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: BoilingPointSkillName
TextString.String: Boiling Point

TextString.Name: BoilingPointSkillDescription
TextString.String:
There's science behind the creation of a good boiled meat, you can't just drop stuff into how water.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: RoundAndMoistCreativitySkillName
TextString.String: Round and Moist

TextString.Name: RoundAndMoistCreativitySkillDescription
TextString.String:
No one like shapeless, dry meatballs that require hours of chewing.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GrillControlSkillName
TextString.String: Grill Control

TextString.Name: GrillControlSkillDescription
TextString.String:
While cooking on a grill one must always pay attention to the temperature: if it's too low or too high, the meat will be ruined.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PreciseCutSkillName
TextString.String: Precise cut

TextString.Name: PreciseCutSkillDescription
TextString.String:
While working with meat it is mandatory to do precise cuts and waste nothing.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GrillOverdriveSkillName
TextString.String: Grill Overdrive

TextString.Name: GrillOverdriveSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Each meat cut requires a different cooking, being able to tune the grill heat according to such principle can reduce cooking times.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: TheCubeningSkillName
TextString.String: The Cubening

TextString.Name: TheCubeningSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Precise, geometrical cuts can dramatically increase the final quality of a Tartare, and allow the chef to quickly prepare it.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: HumidCookingProcessSkillName
TextString.String: Humid Cooking Process

TextString.Name: HumidCookingProcessSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Some meat recipes require a strict control of liquids to prevent both the risk of overcooking and the risk of having a bowl of meat flavored water.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: DryCookingProcessSkillName
TextString.String: Dry Cooking Process

TextString.Name: DryCookingProcessSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Some meat recipes requires no liquids while cooking and the whole process must be carefully planned to delivery high quality dishes.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: FryingProtocolSkillName
TextString.String: Frying Protocol

TextString.Name: FryingProtocolSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Frying is always a delicate process, mastering it with discipline and study is the way to perform.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: BoilingMasterySkillName
TextString.String: Boling Mastery

TextString.Name: BoilingMasterySkillDescription
TextString.String:
Only with a full, scientific understanding of the boiling process one can achieve the Boiling Mastery.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: ExplosiveFlavorSkillName
TextString.String: Explosive Flavor

TextString.Name: ExplosiveFlavorSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Some preparations benefit when using multiple ingredients in perfect balance.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AccurateChoiceSkillName
TextString.String: Accurate Choice

TextString.Name: AccurateChoiceSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Some preparations only need a few secondary ingredients to preserve the unique flavor of meat.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: ConstantTemperatureDataSkillName
TextString.String: Constant Temperature Data

TextString.Name: ConstantTemperatureDataSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Frying is a delicate process and high quality can only be achieved when the Chef is in full control of temperatures.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: ProteinKingSkillName
TextString.String: Protein King

TextString.Name: ProteinKingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Only the ones that prepared countless meat based dishes can wear the crown of Protein King.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AnatomicalEncyclopediaSkillName
TextString.String: Anatomical Encyclopedia

TextString.Name: AnatomicalEncyclopediaSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Fillets and T-bones are not the only edible part of an animal, using everything is both cheaper and more ethical.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: BonesRemovalSkillName
TextString.String: Bones Removal

TextString.Name: BonesRemovalSkillDescription
TextString.String:
To ensure the lowest possible choking ratio among customers, an accurate and complete fish bones removel is necessary.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: DelicateTreatmentSkillName
TextString.String: Delicate Treatment

TextString.Name: DelicateTreatmentSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Cooking fish is not as easy as cooking meat, it is much easier to spoil it.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: FilletingTechniquesSkillName
TextString.String: Filleting Techniques

TextString.Name: FilletingTechniquesSkillDescription
TextString.String:
All you need to properly take care of fish is a firm grip, a sharp blade, and a lot of practice.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: HighTemperatureCookingSkillName
TextString.String: High Temperature Cooking

TextString.Name: HighTemperatureCookingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Grilling or roasting Seafood is not an easy task, you don't really want to serve raw or burned food to your customers.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: WaterAssistedCookingSkillName
TextString.String: Water Assisted Cooking

TextString.Name: WaterAssistedCookingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Using liquids while cooking Seafood can allow a chef to deliver a moist and tasty dish.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: CloudAssistedCookingSkillName
TextString.String: Cloud Assisted Cooking

TextString.Name: CloudAssistedCookingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
With the delicate touch of Steam, Seafood can really express all its taste and flavor
{MODIFIERS}.

TextString.Name: StrictSteamControlSkillName
TextString.String: Strict Steam Control

TextString.Name: StrictSteamControlSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Why waste time and risk to overcook everything when you can just use modern Steam technologies to have the same result in a matter of a few minutes?
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AdaptiveMethodsSkillName
TextString.String: Adaptive Methods

TextString.Name: AdaptiveMethodsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Choosing the most expensive Seafood will allow you to create high quality recipes.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: EfficientProcessSkillName
TextString.String: Efficient Process

TextString.Name: EfficientProcessSkillDescription
TextString.String:
With some preliminary preparation it is easier to deliver good recipes spending less times on them.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: DocumentariesBingeWatchingSkillName
TextString.String: Documentaries BingeWatching

TextString.Name: DocumentariesBingeWatchingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
There's a lot of different Seafood and it kinda look all the same, that's why all the time spent watching documentaries like "Sea Creatures" and "Edible Things in the Sea" is time well spent.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: FasterAndBetterSkillName
TextString.String: Faster and Better

TextString.Name: FasterAndBetterSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Why spending time on cooking Seafood when you can serve it raw? Just remember to freeze it properly.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: BatterAssemblyLineSkillName
TextString.String: Batter Assembly Line

TextString.Name: BatterAssemblyLineSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Frying Seafood is not that easy with all that batter sticking to hands, things, customers. With some practice, you can master the process and quickly deploy Fried Seafood dishes.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: ConcentratedFlavorSkillName
TextString.String: Concentrated Flavors

TextString.Name: ConcentratedFlavorSkillDescription
TextString.String:
While cooking Seafood in water, it is mandatory to learn how to concentrate the flavor of all ingredients.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: LowTemperatureReactionsSkillName
TextString.String: Low Temperature Reactions

TextString.Name: LowTemperatureReactionsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
The temperature needed for Maillard reactions in Seafood is lower compared to meat or vegetables, to increase the final quality some study may be necessary.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: CrunchySurfaceTastyInsideSkillName
TextString.String: Crunchy Surface Tasty

TextString.Name: CrunchySurfaceTastyInsideSkillDescription
TextString.String:
To further increase salivation in customers, a careful control of temperature is necessary while frying different kind of Seafood.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SeasoningDosingSkillName
TextString.String: Seasoning Dosing

TextString.Name: SeasoningDosingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
A Seafood Tartare is a quite delicate dish, properly dosing any kind of seasoning and secondary ingredient is important to preserve the flavor of the main ingredient.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AncientMarinerSkillName
TextString.String: Ancient Mariner

TextString.Name: AncientMarinerSkillDescription
TextString.String:
You need to find an Ancient Mariner and use his/her knowledge about Seafood to finally master it. Quick, head for the nearest port!
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SecretsFromTheDeepSkillName
TextString.String: Secrets from the Deep

TextString.Name: SecretsFromTheDeepSkillDescription
TextString.String:
"Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn"
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GiftsFromTheLandSkillName
TextString.String: Gifts from the Land

TextString.Name: GiftsFromTheLandSkillDescription
TextString.String:
There's so many different vegetables, learning about their taste and flavor is the key to properly use them.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GiftsFromTheTreesSkillName
TextString.String: Gifts from the Trees

TextString.Name: GiftsFromTheTreesSkillDescription
TextString.String:
There are also so many fruits, some are perfect for desserts, other for salads, why don't you try them with Meat or Seafood?
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GiftsFromThePodsSkillName
TextString.String: Gifts from the Pods

TextString.Name: GiftsFromThePodsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Legumes are not only tasty, but also nutritious to the point of being a key element of many cultures' diet.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GreenrocerWisdomSkillName
TextString.String: Greenrocer's Wisdom

TextString.Name: GreenrocerWisdomSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Choosing the right veggies for a certain recipe, knowing how to cook them, is an ancient wisdom.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SideDishesProcessingSkillName
TextString.String: Side Dishes Processing

TextString.Name: SideDishesProcessingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
The easiest and cheapest way to provide a Side Dish is to quickly cook some vegetables in a pan.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SaladAssemblyLineSkillName
TextString.String: Salad Assembly Line

TextString.Name: SaladAssemblyLineSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Salads must be assembled right before they are served to preserve all ingredients' quality, but that doesn't prevent a wise Chef to prepare in advance.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: CrunchyAndNutritiousSkillName
TextString.String: Crunchy and Nutritious

TextString.Name: CrunchyAndNutritiousSkillDescription
TextString.String:
One of the best ways to cook vegetables is to cover them with Steam, making them crunchy and preserving all their vitamins.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SmokedAromaSkillName
TextString.String: Smoked Aroma

TextString.Name: SmokedAromaSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Why not use that beautiful grill with some Veggies instead of always covering it with meat pieces? Everyone loves grilled Veggies.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: MasterlyMixturesSkillName
TextString.String: Masterly Mixtures

TextString.Name: MasterlyMixturesSkillDescription
TextString.String:
When mixing Veggies in a Soup or a Velvety, all flavors must be balanced to let each ingredient express itself.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GreenStockSkillName
TextString.String: Green Stock

TextString.Name: GreenStockSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Stock is a fundamental ingredient in many recipes, learning the role of different Vegetables in it may be the key to add a unique flavor to all your recipes.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: UglyButTastySkillName
TextString.String: Ugly but Tasty

TextString.Name: UglyButTastySkillDescription
TextString.String:
Vegetables and Fruits are often discarded for minor flaws, but using such ingredients is not only cheaper but also environmental friendly.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: MassivePotsSkillName
TextString.String: Massive Pots

TextString.Name: MassivePotsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
With massive pots made of unknown metal, you can easily cook an incredible amount of Soups and Velveties.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: BatterCloakingSkillName
TextString.String: Batter Cloaking

TextString.Name: BatterCloakingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Fried food is always good, even the most annoying people can't resist the aroma of Fried Vegetables.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: OilTemperatureManagementSkillName
TextString.String: Oil Temperature Management

TextString.Name: OilTemperatureManagementSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Each Vegetable needs a different oil temperature while frying, mastering the perfect temperature for each of them is a key knowledge.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: FruitSaladsSkillName
TextString.String: Fruit Salads

TextString.Name: FruitSaladsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Have you ever tried adding different kind of fruits to your salads? The result can be both original and delicious.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: HealthyProtocolSkillName
TextString.String: Healthy Protocol

TextString.Name: HealthyProtocolSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Many people in the world eat too much, but a wise use of vegetables to provide flavor and taste can reduce the need of additional (and caloric) seasonings.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AThousandVeggiesSkillName
TextString.String: A Thousand Veggies

TextString.Name: AThousandVeggiesSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Mixing several ingredients in Soups ans Velveties is the path leading to unique and original dishes.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: FlavorPreservationSkillName
TextString.String: Flavor Preservation

TextString.Name: FlavorPreservationSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Certain cooking processes require the main ingredients' flavor to be preserved, in those cases the lesser is better.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GreenestStockSkillName
TextString.String: Greenest Stock

TextString.Name: GreenestStockSkillDescription
TextString.String:
With study and practice you can create stocks with incredible aroma, allowing you to use them to provide additional quality to your recipes.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GreenTongueSkillName
TextString.String: Green Tongue

TextString.Name: GreenTongueSkillDescription
TextString.String:
You ate so many green stuff that your tongue is turning green. While you hope the rest of your body won't change, that further improved your creativity with Vegetables.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AdeptOfGaiaSkillName
TextString.String: Adept of Gaia

TextString.Name: AdeptOfGaiaSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Getting in complete symbiosis with nature will allow you to see how food wasting is a serious issue.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: VForVeganSkillName
TextString.String: V For Vegan (and Vegetarian)

TextString.Name: VForVeganSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Who said that Vegan and Vegetarian food is tasteless? Lots of people, so you better prove them how wrong they are!
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PreparationPipelineSkillName
TextString.String: Preparation Pipeline

TextString.Name: PreparationPipelineSkillDescription
TextString.String:
A wise preparation can lead to a smoother service when the restaurant is full of customers.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SweetnessBalancingSkillName
TextString.String: Sweetness Balancing

TextString.Name: SweetnessBalancingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Modern desserts are made not be too sweet and offer a more complex Taste profile.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: FlavorsDosingSkillName
TextString.String: Flavors Dosing

TextString.Name: FlavorsDosingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Flavors must be dosed properly, especially to decrease expenses.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: CookieChipsAssemblingSkillName
TextString.String: Cookie Chips Assembling

TextString.Name: CookieChipsAssemblingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Cookies need propers chips but their creation is anything but simple.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GrandmasHandbookSkillName
TextString.String: Grandma's Handbook

TextString.Name: GrandmasHandbookSkillDescription
TextString.String:
You just stole your Grandma's most treasured possssion and you are not even ashamed.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SmallDessertsAssemblingSkillName
TextString.String: Small Desserts Assembling

TextString.Name: SmallDessertsAssemblingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Assembling tiny pastries makes them more tempting to the eye.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PerfectTextureSkillName
TextString.String: Perfect Texture

TextString.Name: PerfectTextureSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Ice cream shouldn't be too icy, despite its name, otherwise it won't satisfy most customers.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: FriedSweetnessSkillName
TextString.String: Fried Sweetness

TextString.Name: FriedSweetnessSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Anything is good when fried, Desserts in particular. But the cooking process must be done in order not to negatively affect the flavor.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: HighTemperatureOilSkillName
TextString.String: High Temperature Oil

TextString.Name: HighTemperatureOilSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Buying a good frying oil and keeping its temperature High, you can more easily create fried Desserts.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SmallPortionsBigDecorationsSkillName
TextString.String: Small Portions, Big Decorations

TextString.Name: SmallPortionsBigDecorationsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Confusing your customers with beautiful and colored decorations is perfect to hide the fact that you delivered small portions.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SugarReductionProtocolSkillName
TextString.String: Sugar Reduction Protocol

TextString.Name: SugarReductionProtocolSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Properly dosing the sugar in all desserts is mandatory to make them as healthy as possible.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: BakingSchoolSkillName
TextString.String: Baking School

TextString.Name: BakingSchoolSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Watching online tutorials on the baking process can dramatically increase your skill with some Desserts.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: OneMoreLayerSkillName
TextString.String: One More Layer...

TextString.Name: OneMoreLayerSkillDescription
TextString.String:
We all know it is called "A Thousand Sheets" but it shouldn't be taken literally.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: AppliedMarketingSkillName
TextString.String: Applied Marketing

TextString.Name: AppliedMarketingSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Your customers are obsessed with healthy food and refuse to order desserts? Nothing better than some old school marketing to shatter their noble ideals.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: UndergroundGrandmasCagesSkillName
TextString.String: Underground Grandmas' Cages

TextString.Name: UndergroundGrandmasCagesSkillDescription
TextString.String:
No one knows why so many senior people started to disappear, but suddenly your dessert baking pipeline became much faster.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: SweetestPersonWorldSkillName
TextString.String: Sweetest Person in the World

TextString.Name: SweetestPersonWorldSkillDescription
TextString.String:
That doesn't mean you are a nice person, but that you worked so much with desserts that everything you touch becomes sweeter.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GeneticallyModifiedSugarsSkillName
TextString.String: Genetically Modified Sugars

TextString.Name: GeneticallyModifiedSugarsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Genetically modifying sugars to make them less caloric may solve you a lot of problems.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: UnconventionalDessertsSkillName
TextString.String: Unconventional Desserts

TextString.Name: UnconventionalDessertsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
By focusing on desserts that can't be done easily at home, you can offer more quality products to your customers.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: GloriousNutsSkillName
TextString.String: Glorious Nuts

TextString.Name: GloriousNutsSkillDescription
TextString.String:
Kneel before the glory of Nuts, and be rewarded with the secret knowledge you need to properly use all their power.
{MODIFIERS}
